content: Modern electron microscopes have become powerful tools not only in terms of achievable spatial resolution - reaching now constantly values in the sub-Angstrom range, but also by adding more and more analytical capabilities such as EDX, BSE, STEM, 4D-STEM or EELS analysis techniques to the instruments. As a global supplier of modern radiation detectors for both x-rays and electrons, PNDetector is offering state-of-the-art detectors for most of these analytical techniques which are nowadays part of the standard outfit of the microscope.
